name: Breathable
description: A planet with an atmosphere that can support human life without the need for specialized equipment.

name: Toxic
description: An atmosphere containing harmful gases or chemicals that pose a danger to human health.

name: Corrosive
description: An atmosphere that can cause damage to materials and structures, often due to acidic or reactive components.

name: Thin
description: An atmosphere with low pressure, providing limited protection from radiation and extreme temperatures.

name: Dense
description: An atmosphere with high pressure, which can create a greenhouse effect and lead to extreme surface conditions.
